name: backbone
description: Give your JS App some Backbone with Models, Views, Collections, and Events.
author: Jeremy Ashkenas

scripts.test: karma start && coffee test/model.coffee && npm run lint
scripts.build-debug: npx rollup -e backbone -f umd -g backbone:Backbone -n Backbone.debugInfo -o debug-info.js --no-strict modules/debug-info.js
scripts.mark-release: replace-in-file MARK_DEVELOPMENT MARK_RELEASE modules/debug-info.js && npm run build-debug
scripts.mark-develop: replace-in-file MARK_RELEASE MARK_DEVELOPMENT modules/debug-info.js && npm run build-debug
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run mark-release && npm run build && npm run alias-sourcemap && npm run doc && git add -u && npm run mark-develop
